DOC.brief_summary: The purpose trial compare effectiveness cost five-module Internet-based treatment program ( include therapist support ) harmful alcohol use effectiveness cost treatment content deliver face-to-face specialized addiction treatment . The hypothesis test trial : 1 . The Internet-based treatment program ( include therapist support ) effective ( reduce alcohol consumption ) treatment content deliver face-to-face specialized addiction treatment . 2 . The Internet-based treatment program ( include therapist support ) associate low cost per treat individual relation achieve effect ( term reduce alcohol consumption ) compare treatment content deliver face-to-face specialized addiction treatment . The design two-armed randomized control trial , outcomes measure term change alcohol consumption , problematic alcohol use well alcohol dependence , depression , anxiety , quality life cost treatment . A minimum 350 participant recruit randomized two group : Intervention group 1 : All participant group access five-module Internet-based treatment program harmful alcohol use access therapist training psychotherapy ( CBT ) assist counsel participant throughout program . Intervention group 2 : All participant group attend five face-to-face treatment session specialize addiction treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Costs Internet-based Treatment Harmful Alcohol Use Face-to-face Treatment Addiction Care
DOC.criteria: 18 year old 16 point Alcohol Use Disorders Identification Test least 3 criterion International Classification Diseases ( ICD10 ) Alcohol Dependence Resident Stockholm County Lack understanding Swedish language . Doctor 's assessment risk severe withdrawal symptom , risk suicide mental illness require separate care . Doctor 's assessment need medication alcohol dependence .
